bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Design Criteria of Integrated Sensor-Based Test Applications for Household Appliances
IEEE Standard for Design Criteria of Integrated Sensor-Based Test Applications for Household Appliances

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: An integrated framework of the test software for household appliances is defined. This standard specifies the test environment and the test information as well as the means to acquire the information (either Web services or a data-exchange file).

An integrated framework of the test software for household appliances is defined. This standard specifies the test environment and the test information as well as the means to acquire the information (either Web services or a data-exchange file). Additonal files are available at http://standards.ieee.org/downloads/1851/index.html

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
